attributes.action: Ensure that MP's do not vote to exempt themselves from Freedom of Information on their expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It would appear that some MP's have been over-charging their legitimate expenses and that some of them may introduce a bill to keep the public in ignorance of this fact in future.
As taxpayers we believe this information must be available to their constituents, the general public, who have to pay these costs out of their already high taxes.

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/expenses-MPs/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
